lead_paragraph: The coordinated assaults on bus stations and part of a hospital brought the horrors of the country’s civil war into a region that had been relatively safe.

byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard reported from Beirut, and Maher Samaan from Paris.
byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and MAHER SAMAAN

headline.print_headline: Suicide Attacks Hit 2 Syria Cities, Killing Scores and Shattering Calm in Assad Stronghold
headline.main: Suicide Attacks Hit 2 Syrian Cities in Assad Stronghold, Killing Scores

snippet: The coordinated assaults on bus stations and part of a hospital brought the horrors of the country’s civil war into a region that had been relatively safe.
abstract: Suicide bombers stage coordinated attacks on bus stations and public hospital in Syria, killing scores of civilians; attacks penetrate deep into government-controlled area of country.
